taskGroup.name: Become an Enabler
taskGroup.intro: This cheat sheet will guide you through the individual steps to make the Eclipse Browser extensible allowing downstream clients to plug in their own browser.
taskGroup.onCompletion: Congratulations! You have just enabled your Eclipse Browser view to be extended by other plug-ins.

task.name: Create an Extension Point
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create an extension point.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just created a new extension point.

task.name: Define the Extension Point Schema
task.intro: This tutorial will demonstrate how to define and preview an extension point schema.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You created an extension point schema, a contract that your clients have to adhere to when they want to plug in their own browser into the Eclipse Browser view.

task.name: Make the Eclipse Browser view extensible
task.intro: This tutorial will show you how to make the list of browsers used in the Eclipse Browser view extensible.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! The list of browsers used in the Eclipse Browser view is now extensible by clients.
